title: Number of connected wearable devices worldwide by region 2015 to 2022
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 6 lines namely Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, North America, and Western Europe. The y axis represents Wearable devices in millions and the x axis represents Year.
Overall North America is rapidly increasing, Asia Pacific, Central and Eastern Europe, Latin America, Middle East and Africa, and Western Europe are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, North America mostly maintained the highest Wearable devices in millions when compared to others with a mean value of 230.25, and it peaked at 2022.
Followed by Asia Pacific which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 174.7 Wearable devices in millions,reaching its highest point  at 2022 with a value of 311.0.
Latin America mostly had the least Wearable devices in millions with a mean value of 24.42, which peaked at 2022 with a value of 49.0.
Latin America reported the lowest Wearable devices in millions about 1.83 in Year 2015
North America has increased by 1035.8344113842174 percent.
